name: Saint Ampelus
summary: Saint Ampelus is a martyr venerated by the Eastern Orthodox and Roman Catholic churches on November 20. He was killed by Romans with his companion, Gaius, during the reign of Diocletian.
biography: Saint Ampelus is a martyr venerated by the Eastern Orthodox and Roman Catholic churches on November 20. He was killed by Romans with his companion, Gaius, during the reign of Diocletian.
